application.name: cnetbin2pvl
application.brief: Converts an Isis control network file from binary into pvl format.

description.p: This program converts an Isis control network file from binary into a human readable UTF-8 pvl formatted file. The output .pvl will be written as the latest PVL version. The most recent PVL template can be found in the Control data directory under templates/controlnetworks.

history.change: Change parameter name to FROM and TO.
Updated Description to reflect UTF-8 file format. Added link to current PVL template. Added user example.
